title: China demographic crisis looms as population growth slips to lowest ever
content:
1. China demographic crisis looms as population growth slips to lowest ever  Reuters
  2. China's Census Shows Population Barely Grew in 10 Years as Births Plummet  The New York Times
  3. China's Population Growth Slows Amid Declining Births  Bloomberg Markets and Finance
  4. China should accelerate adjustments in population policies, but no need to panic: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. China's Slowing Population Growth Is the World's Problem  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 人口増加率が過去最低となった中国、人口危機が迫る
中国人口危机迫在眉睫，人口增长降至历史最低点
